parameters.Description: Readymix thermal insulating mortar containing superlight aggregates made of virgin expanded polystyrene beads with curved grain size (Ã¸ 2 mm.), with controlled density, precoated bead by bead with E.I.A. additive in the production phase. Pre-batched at 300 kg/mc cement. It is recommended also for the realization of mortars for lightweight single-layer substrates with Piano Zero system for direct gluing of floor coverings (see technical data sheet and the application manual).
